title: 299 - 4 Ways to Silence the Inner Critic and Unlock Your Best Work with Danielle Krysa AKA The Jealous Curator
description:
...........................................................................................

SHOW NOTES

...........................................................................................

Danielle Krysa
https://www.daniellekrysaart.com/
http://instagram.com/daniellekrysaart

The Jealous Curator
https://www.instagram.com/thejealouscurator/

Danielle’s new Kids Book ‘How to Spot an Artist’
https://www.amazon.com/How-Spot-Artist-Might-Messy/dp/3791374400

Your Inner Critic is Being a Jerk by Danielle Krysa
https://www.amazon.com/Your-Inner-Critic-Big-Jerk/dp/1452148449/ref=pd_lpo_14_img_1/131-9868361-3369424?_encoding=UTF8&pd_rd_i=1452148449&pd_rd_r=05fcaa15-b34e-4d37-a355-e23036d6aefa&pd_rd_w=JaYps&pd_rd_wg=5VcSM&pf_rd_p=7b36d496-f366-4631-94d3-61b87b52511b&pf_rd_r=PKRS6KFBP1PHX5Z2SC57&psc=1&refRID=PKRS6KFBP1PHX5Z2SC57

A Big Important Art Book - Now With Women by Danielle Krysa
https://www.amazon.com/Big-Important-Book-Women-Artists/dp/0762463791/ref=pd_lpo_14_img_2/131-9868361-3369424?_encoding=UTF8&pd_rd_i=0762463791&pd_rd_r=a5af43ce-f837-416f-802c-4a2c7306624a&pd_rd_w=nQWD4&pd_rd_wg=gEE2l&pf_rd_p=7b36d496-f366-4631-94d3-61b87b52511b&pf_rd_r=W6ZAHNKYJB0BW6A8SE5V&psc=1&refRID=W6ZAHNKYJB0BW6A8SE5V

Creative Block by Danielle Krysa
https://www.amazon.com/Creative-Block-Discover-Projects-Successful/dp/1452118884

Danielle’s Skillshare Class
https://www.skillshare.com/classes/Creative-Breakthrough-8-Exercises-to-Power-Your-Creativity-Confidence-Career/2042111498?via=user-profile

SPONSORS

...........................................................................................

PATREON
If you’re a podcaster, Youtuber, musician, writer, illustrator... if you’re a creative person of any kind, or simply love one, now is the time to check out patreon.com. Now is the time to join the millions of fans and creators who are changing the way art is valued together.

 

STORYBLOCKS
This episode is brought to you by Storyblocks Video. Story Blocks give you studio-quality 4k stock video without blowing your budget. If you need b-roll, after effects templates, or video motion background you gotta check out Storyblocks Video. Head to storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk to learn more about Storyblocks Video today.

 

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to skillshare.com/creativepeptalk  to get started!!!

itunes:title: 299 - 4 Ways to Silence the Inner Critic and Unlock Your Best Work with Danielle Krysa AKA The Jealous Curator
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
You are holding ideas in your head that are blocking your best work and the worst part? You can’t even see them! 

Danielle Krysa AKA The Jealous Curator is an expert at unblocking your work and helping you escape the inner critic that’s holding you back. HECK she wrote the book on it!

Danielle has a beautiful soul that is SOOOO CREATIVE PEP TALK and she’s a tremendous artist. This was a fabulous and meaningful conversation. Can’t wait for you to hear it!

Danielle has a new kid’s book out that every kid in your life needs - it will help stop their inner critic before they are even able to set up camp! CHECK IT OUT! 
https://www.amazon.com/How-Spot-Artist-Might-Messy/dp/3791374400 

Listen & Subscribe on Apple Podcasts
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/creative-pep-talk/id929743897
